info.title: API
info.description: API allows you to interact directly the merchandising system

post.summary: authenticates a user a returns an access token

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of resources by page. Default value is 20. Must be an integer

parameters.description: Page number of result set. Must be an integer

patch.summary: adds one item to the catalog

get.summary: get a price list by id.

200.description: the price list with the given id

delete.summary: delete a price list by id.

patch.summary: adds one item to the price list

delete.summary: removes an item from the price list by id.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of resources by page. Default value is 20. Must be an integer

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of result set. Must be an integer

200.description: the item with the given id

get.summary: provide all config data the front end app needs

parameters.name: salesChannelId
parameters.description: the sales channel numeric id or subdomain string.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of resources by page. Default value is 20. Must be an integer

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of result set. Must be an integer

code.description: The error code that refers the error type.

count.description: The number of rows returned. Default name is count. Enabled by default.

totalCount.description: The total numbers of rows available. Default name is totalCount. Enabled by default.

pageCount.description: The total number of pages available. Default name is pageCount, enabled by default.

self.description: The link to the requested page. Default name is self, enabled by default.

previous.description: The link to the previous page. Default name is previous, enabled by default. null if no previous page is available.

next.description: Same than previous but with next page.

first.description: Same than previous but with first page.

last.description: Same than previous but with last page.

page.description: The page number requested. Default name is page, disabled by default.

limit.description: The limit requested. Default name is limit, disabled by default.
